metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0146 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Hardware allows activation of test or debug logic at runtime for someIntel(R) processors which may allow an unauthenticated user to potentiallyenable escalation of privilege via physical access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-0146` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20220510.0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20220510.0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
